author: LinOnetwo
description: Record life principles as tiddlers and review them
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/UI/outline-breadcrumbs-view-template":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/UI/outline-breadcrumbs-view-template","tags":"$:/tags/ViewTemplate","list-before":"$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/body","text":"<%if [has[stream-type]] %> <%if [linonetwo.principles[]title] %> <> <%endif%> <%endif%> "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/UI/principle-outline":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/UI/principle-outline","text":"<$wikify name="defaultRootTiddler" text="<>"> <$transclude $variable="stream-outliner" currentTiddler=<> newNodeTitle="<>-<>" /> "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/config":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/config","tags":"$:/tags/ControlPanel/SettingsTab","caption":"<>","text":"\procedure lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/ <> --- !! <> ;<> :<$wikify name="defaultRootTiddler" text="<>"><$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/configs/RootTiddler" tabindex=-1 focus=false cancelPopups="yes" fileDrop=no tag="input" placeholder=<> /> <> "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/configs/RootTiddler":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/configs/RootTiddler","text":""},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/deck/PrinciplesDeck":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/deck/PrinciplesDeck","caption":"<>","card":"[linonetwo.principles[]]","card_exclude":"[tag[!]]","card_unfold":"[linonetwo.principles[]]","description":"<>","exclude_action":"{{$:/plugins/tidme/fsrs4tw/buttons/action/exclude}}","leech_action":"{{$:/plugins/tidme/fsrs4tw/buttons/action/exclude}}","leech_threshold":"8","order":"due-new","order_due":"[sort[due]]","order_learn":"[sort[due]]","order_new":"[sortan[title]]","p":"{"request_retention":0.9,"maximum_interval":36500,"w":[0.4,0.6,2.4,5.8,4.93,0.94,0.86,0.01,1.49,0.14,0.94,2.18,0.05,0.34,1.26,0.29,2.61]}","state_due":"[state[2]has[due]] -[!days:due[1]]","state_learn":"[state[1]] [state[3]] :filter[{!!due}compare:date:lt]","state_new":"[!has[state]] [state[0]]","tags":"$:/tags/TidmeDeck","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","unfold_action":"{{$:/plugins/tidme/fsrs4tw/buttons/action/unfold}}"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/style.css":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/style.css","text":".principles-container{height:100vh;padding-left:10vw;padding-right:10vw;padding-top:2em;overflow-x:visible;overflow-y:auto}.principles-container h1{text-align:center;font-family:Garamond,'Times New Roman',Times,serif,KaiTi,STKaiti,'Songti SC',SimSun,NSimSun,FangSong,STSong,serif;font-size:2em;font-weight:400;text-decoration:underline;text-underline-offset:0.3em}.principles-container .principles-back-to-standard-layout-button{position:absolute;left:1em;top:1em;opacity:.2;transition:opacity .5s}.principles-container .principles-back-to-standard-layout-button:hover{opacity:1}","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","type":"text/css"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/en-GB/Readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/en-GB/Readme","text":"\procedure lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/ \import [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/layout/back-to-standard-layout]] ! <> <> [ext[Principles|https://www.principles.com]] in the book is organized in tree structure, and I hope each could be linked from the diary or other notes, and revisit by [ext[Tidme plugin|$:/plugins/tidme/fsrs4tw]], so this plugin integrate the [[Streams plugin|$:/plugins/linonetwo/streams-outliner-lib]] to input the outline of principles. !! Usage <>, you will see an outline UI provided by the [[Streams plugin|$:/plugins/linonetwo/streams-outliner-lib]]. After input, you can use the <> button at the top left to return to the standard layout. "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/en-GB/Name":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/en-GB/Name","text":"Principles"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/en-GB/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/en-GB/Description","text":"Record life principles as tiddlers and review them"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/en-GB/Configs/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/en-GB/Configs/Description","text":"These settings let you customise the behaviour of "Principles" plugin."},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/en-GB/Configs/PluginConfigs/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/en-GB/Configs/PluginConfigs/Caption","text":"Plugin Configs"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/en-GB/Configs/RootTiddler/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/en-GB/Configs/RootTiddler/Caption","text":"Root node tiddler name"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/en-GB/Configs/RootTiddler/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/en-GB/Configs/RootTiddler/Description","text":"Defaults to "<>", all outline node tiddler names are stored in the `stream-list` field of this tiddler for indexing purposes. You can change this to any other tiddler name you like."},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/en-GB/Deck/Name":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/en-GB/Deck/Name","text":"My Principles"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/en-GB/Deck/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/en-GB/Deck/Description","text":"A gentleman knows what to do and what to refrain from. As one who reviews the past to gain new insights can be a mentor."},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/en-GB/BackToStandardLayout":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/en-GB/BackToStandardLayout","text":"Standard Layout"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/en-GB/OpenPrinciplesLayout":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/en-GB/OpenPrinciplesLayout","text":"Open Principles Layout"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/zh-Hans/Readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/zh-Hans/Readme","text":"\procedure lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/ \import [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/layout/back-to-standard-layout]] ! <> <> [ext[原则|https://www.principles.com]]这本书是树形结构组织的，而且我希望每条原则都可以从你的日记或其它笔记条目中链接过来，通过[[Tidme插件|$:/plugins/tidme/fsrs4tw]]间隔重复，所以本插件中整合了[[Streams插件|$:/plugins/linonetwo/streams-outliner-lib]]来进行原则的大纲输入。 !! 使用方法 <>，你会看到一个由[[Streams插件|$:/plugins/linonetwo/streams-outliner-lib]]提供的大纲UI。 输入完成后，你可以使用左上角的 <> 按钮来返回标准布局。 "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/zh-Hans/Name":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/zh-Hans/Name","text":"原则"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/zh-Hans/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/zh-Hans/Description","text":"记人生原则为诸条目，时习之"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/zh-Hans/Configs/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/zh-Hans/Configs/Description","text":"通过这些设置，您可以自定义「原则」插件的行为。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/zh-Hans/Configs/PluginConfigs/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/zh-Hans/Configs/PluginConfigs/Caption","text":"插件设置"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/zh-Hans/Configs/RootTiddler/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/zh-Hans/Configs/RootTiddler/Caption","text":"根节点条目名"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/zh-Hans/Configs/RootTiddler/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/zh-Hans/Configs/RootTiddler/Description","text":"默认使用「<>」，所有大纲节点的条目名都会存储在这个条目的 `stream-list` 字段中，供索引使用。你可以修改为其它你喜欢的条目名。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/zh-Hans/Deck/Name":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/zh-Hans/Deck/Name","text":"我的原则"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/zh-Hans/Deck/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/zh-Hans/Deck/Description","text":"君子有所为，有所不为。温故而知新，可以为师矣。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/zh-Hans/BackToStandardLayout":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/zh-Hans/BackToStandardLayout","text":"返回标准布局"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/zh-Hans/OpenPrinciplesLayout":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/zh-Hans/OpenPrinciplesLayout","text":"打开原则布局"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/layout/back-to-standard-layout":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/layout/back-to-standard-layout","text":"\procedure back-to-standard-layout-button() <$button class="principles-back-to-standard-layout-button"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/layout" text="" $timestamp="no" /> {{$:/core/images/standard-layout}} <> \end \procedure open-principles-layout-button() <$button> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/layout" text="$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/layout/layout" $timestamp="no" /> {{$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/layout/icon}} <> \end "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/layout/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/layout/icon","tags":"$:/tags/Image","text":"\parameters (size:"22pt") "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/layout/layout":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/layout/layout","name":"<>","icon":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/layout/icon","description":"<>","tags":"$:/tags/Layout","text":"\whitespace trim \import [subfilter{$:/core/config/GlobalImportFilter}] [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/layout/back-to-standard-layout]] \define containerClasses() tc-page-container tc-language-$(languageTitle)$ principles-container \end \procedure lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/ \procedure redirected-navigate-actions() <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/layout" text="" /> <$action-navigate $to=<> /> \end <$navigator story="$:/StoryList" history="$:/HistoryList" openLinkFromInsideRiver={{$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromInsideRiver}} openLinkFromOutsideRiver={{$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromOutsideRiver}} relinkOnRename={{$:/config/RelinkOnRename}}> <$messagecatcher $tm-navigate=<>> {{$:/core/ui/CommandPaletteTemplate}}
>> <>

{{$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/UI/principle-outline}}
"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/readme","text":"\procedure lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/ <> "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/tree":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/tree","text":"<>"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/deck/principles-filter.js":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/deck/principles-filter.js","type":"application/javascript","module-type":"filteroperator","Modern.TiddlyDev#Origin":"deck/principles-filter.ts","text":""use strict";var lingoBase="$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/language/";function lingo(e){var i=$tw.wiki.filterTiddlers("[[$:/language]get[text]get[name]else[en-GB]]")[0];return $tw.wiki.getTiddlerText(""+lingoBase+i+"/"+e,e)}var principlesFilter=(e,i)=>{let t=$tw.wiki.getTiddlerText("$:/plugins/linonetwo/principles/configs/RootTiddler");return t=t||lingo("Name"),$tw.wiki.filterTiddlers(`[[${t}]get-stream-nodes:exclusive[]]`)};exports["linonetwo.principles"]=principlesFilter;"}}}
title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/principles
name: Principles 原则
